text: Nigba ti Tira kan si de ba won lati odo Allahu, ti o n fi idi ododo mule nipa ohun ti o wa pelu won, bee si ni teletele won ti n toro isegun lori awon to sai gbagbo, amo nigba ti ohun ti won nimo nipa re de ba won, won sai gbagbo ninu re. Nitori naa, ibi dandan Allahu ki o maa ba awon alaigbagbo
